original_title: Te darías cuenta de que soy una sobreviviente?
overview: A Queer South American artist transforms her female bust into a male chest in the bathroom of a dive bar in NYC’s East Village. Then they transform their face inside the bar while sharing fragments of their life and getting ready to go out without a certain destination. It all happens in the time provided by one roll of Super 8 film.
title: Would You Realize That I’m a Survivor?
